methods.name: getAssetProof
methods.summary: Get a merkle proof for a compressed asset by its public key.
methods.description: This method is crucial for transactions with compressed assets. For example, to successfully transfer a compressed assets, you must provide the proof and tree.

metadata.description: AI Generated Art using GNT on MOOAR.com (http://mooar.com/) from Find Satoshi Lab, the creators of STEPN, MOOAR and Gas Hero. GNT Prompt by DrAksenov: Space A multi-colored holiday textured box with an orange letter M on it. dark background. holiday mood, beautiful, bokeh background, funny cat, magic light, HDR, 3D, 8k, bright warm colors blue, pink, yellow, Negative Prompt: table  Prompt by Quyen: A cute cat wearing crown in the treasure chest, in the style of digital painting, dark magenta and light gold, hyper-realistic water, stone, angular geometry, aurora punk Prompt by Momohiki: A diamond in a gift box. christmas gift, very detailed, extreme detail, high detail, full color spectrum, 32k, ultra high resolution, UHD, global lighting, frontal lighting, breathtaking, beautiful, amazing, awe-inspiring, intense mood, colors gorgeous, stunning graphics, intense, intricate details, finely detailed, octane render.
metadata.name: DRiP MOOAR Out of The Box!

methods.name: searchAssets
methods.summary: Search for assets using a variety of parameters.
methods.description: This method will return assets based on the specified custom search criteria.

params.name: negate
params.description: Optional flag to negate the search criteria.

params.name: conditionType
params.description: The type of search condition to apply.

params.name: interface
params.description: The interface type to filter the assets.

params.name: ownerAddress
params.description: The owner's public key address.

params.name: ownerType
params.description: The ownership model used for the asset.

params.name: creatorAddress
params.description: The public key of the asset's creator.

params.name: creatorVerified
params.description: Flag indicating if the creator is verified.

params.name: authorityAddress
params.description: The authority's public key address.

params.name: grouping
params.description: Group key-value pair to filter assets by a specific collection or group.

params.name: delegate
params.description: The public key of the delegate for the asset.

params.name: frozen
params.description: Flag indicating if the asset is frozen.

params.name: supply
params.description: The supply of the asset.

params.name: supplyMint
params.description: The public key of the mint for the asset supply.

params.name: compressed
params.description: Flag indicating if the asset is compressed.

params.name: compressible
params.description: Flag indicating if the asset can be compressed.

params.name: royaltyTargetType
params.description: The royalty model associated with the asset.

params.name: royaltyTarget
params.description: The target address for royalty payments.

params.name: royaltyAmount
params.description: The amount of royalties associated with the asset.

params.name: tokenType
params.description: The type of token.

params.name: burnt
params.description: Flag indicating if the asset has been burnt.

params.name: jsonUri
params.description: The URI for additional JSON metadata.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the asset.
